Package: grails.views

[Groovy] Class ResolvableGroovyTemplateEngine

      • grails.views.ResolvableGroovyTemplateEngine

      • A TemplateEngine that can resolve templates using the configured TemplateResolver

        Authors:
        Graeme Rocher
        Since:
        1.0

            Resolves a template for the given path

            Parameters:
            path - The path to the template
            qualifiers - One or many qualifiers to scope the view (for example the locale, the version etc.)

            The template or null if it doesn't exist
